meanings.definition: Of or relating to lines on a map connecting points of equal elevation.
meanings.sent1: The isoplethic lines on the map showed areas of the same height.
meanings.sent2: The isoplethic representation helped us understand the terrain better.
meanings.sent3: The isoplethic markings on the map made it look like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her drawing was isoplethic, with each section having an equal elevation of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The isoplethic concept made the map easier to read and interpret.

meanings.sent5: The isoplethic nature of the experiment ensured reliable results.
